message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,200,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. Based on my research and understanding of the product's value, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1,500,000. I believe this price is fair and reflects the product's worth to me. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
